{{Description|If you can perceive the heavens and the earth, defend against malignant auras with the flow of qi, and keep your mind clear, surely nothing can hinder you.}}
'''Holistic Revivification''' is [[Baizhu]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Throughout the whole duration of the Pulsing Clarity state, a total of '''6''' shields will be created, including the shield created when casting the Elemental Burst.
;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|All Things Are of the Earth|character=Baizhu|talent=Holistic Revivification}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|All Aspects Stabilized}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Ancient Art of Perception}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|Elimination of Malicious Qi}}
